text.s: Hello, this is a text which has been sentence-segmented.
The next sentence will contain some named entities!
Astrid Lindgren was born on the 14th of November 1907 on the farm Näs outside Vimmerby, in the county of Småland, and died on the 28th January 2002 in her home on Dalagatan 46 in Stockholm.
Here comes another text in the same corpus.

The formatting is a bit
weird on purpose!
We are testing Sparv. Is this wrongly segmented sentence?
Yes it is, but that's ok.
